addFactory

public void addFactory(java.lang.String protocol,
                       SourceFactory factory)
                throws ProcessingException
Add a new source factory. The factory is initialized by the handler, this means the handler test for the Avalon interfaces Composable, Contextualizable and Loggable. When the handler is disposed it should also test the Disposable interface. If a factory with the protocol already exists it is overridden by this new factory.
